Articles.Content:
Has anyone have had the following

  • Invisible planets
  • Over warping Time warps
  • LAAAAAAAAAAAG
  • when clicking the buttons on the maneuver mode it creates intensely big icons
  • more Kraken
  • Rockets previously designed in 1.6 and same design built in 1.7 flipping over from g-force (that doesn't make sense) 

I just want to report these to Squad...

I own a Latitude Laptop if that makes the situation better (But it's specs run way better then the recommended ksp specs)

Edited April 29, 2019 by Guest

2 hours ago, The Doodling Astronaut said:

Has anyone have had the following

  • Invisible planets
  • Over warping Time warps
  • LAAAAAAAAAAAG
  • when clicking the buttons on the maneuver mode it creates intensely big icons
  • more Kraken
  • Rockets previously designed in 1.6 and same design built in 1.7 flipping over from g-force (that doesn't make sense) 

I just want to report these to Squad...

I own a Latitude Laptop if that makes the situation better (But it's specs run way better then the recommended ksp specs)

The Latitude I play on has great specs but the resolution is lower than KSP's minimum setting. 

Try the AnyRes mod.
